install: ./scripts/ci-helpers.sh install-deps && ./scripts/ci-helpers.sh setup-fuse && cd fs-core && cargo fetch

terminals.name: Test Watch
terminals.command: cd fs-core && cargo watch -x 'test --test persistence_test --test write_operations -- --test-threads=1'

terminals.name: FUSE Debug
terminals.command: export RUST_LOG=debug && export RUST_BACKTRACE=1 && cd fs-core && echo 'Debug mode enabled. Run filesystem commands here.'
